name: Free Code Camp Projects
altText: A blue background with a white textbox centered inside, which shows a quote from Ratatouille, with a twitter icon in the lower left and a new quote button on the lower right.

A title of Wiki-Search, with a text box to enter your search and a search button, a link to view a random article, and then a list of search results, each showing the title of the wiki article, a short description of the article, and a link to read the full article.
description: Projects created while working through the Free Code Camp curriculum. Through these projects, I first experienced pulling data from API's & started learning more about styling and testing. During Hactoberfest in 2017 I also improved some of the documentation for Free Code Camp's weather API source.
